website_summaries.verdict: The shirred front with tummy control panel controls and disguises a multitude of figure flaws.
pros: A flattering, well-fitting cut and classic design makes this a winner
It has good bra support, and also comes in a range of colors and patterns
cons: Some fading was noted after a few uses and washings

customer_reviews.title: I love this suit!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit so much I got it in all colors. I’m 5’7” & 175 lbs, D cup. I bought a 14 and ordered my next one in a 16 just to compare. They both fit well so I’m keeping both sizes. If you think you’re between sizes & you’re a little bigger in the bust, go with the 16. This holds in & camouflages your tummy with adjustable straps and better support through the bust than I’ve found in other suits. I wish there were more than 3 colors:prints available. I would get them all!
customer_reviews.author: dalgal1

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic swimsuit! At the young age of 57 with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic swimsuit! At the young age of 57 with a tummy to hide (5’3, 160 lbs.), this suit fits perfectly and is so very flattering. The bust has great padding and helps to make my own feel enhanced and supported. I LOVE THIS SUIT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice!!
customer_reviews.text: So as a post-partum mom, finding a bathing suit that fits and looks good without being "maternal" can be hard. This suit is really good at hiding my belly with its ruching, but bares enough to be sexy. The straps are nice and wide for a bigger bust, and it has decent support. I'm glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: POOR MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: On September 16,2018 .... Not quite four months ago, I purchased two of these black and a blue one.... It doesn't do well in a swimming pool. Look at the attached photo.. you'll see the entire back is GONE...... No return policy after 30 days... DO NOT PURCHASED THIS SWIM SUIT... Let's see if they leave this post up....
customer_reviews.author: J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! I am in between a 10 and 12. I purchased a 12, and it fits perfectly. It is one of the most flattering swimsuits I have purchased in a long time! I am about to purchase another one in a different color!!! The price is awesome for this swimsuit!! I hate swimsuit shopping, and this purchase was a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this bathing suit. I took it on a vacation to Thailand where I’d be doing a lot excursions and wanted something secure (not a two piece) the bust fit perfect (I’m a 36DD) as well as the rest of the bathing suit. The backside covered perfect. I ordered the 16 (I’m 5’7 200 lbs). Usually I’m a 12 so the sizing is definitely off since I had to go up some. It made me feel sexy without the dreaded “it’s a one piece not so sexy vibe”
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite suit! It fits me extremely well and looks great on. I always have a hard time finding a bathing suit that fits me; I’m 5’9.5” and this one is perfect. I love it has adjustable straps and the tummy control is also good. I may end up buying it in another color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Super happy
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this suit. If seems to be good quality and fit perfect, true to measurement. It is also flattering and thinning. It accentuates the good curves and still hides what you may not want seen if you were to wear a bikini.
customer_reviews.author: Jen&Phil

customer_reviews.title: I love this one
customer_reviews.text: I love this one. I ordered 4 different one pieces and this is the only one that I kept. It has great support for larger breasts.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: fits great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of wearing bathing suits in public. This suit is comfortable and makes me feel well covered. As a bonus is does a great job hiding a few extra pounds around my stomach area.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful suit - I did have to return it due ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful suit - I did have to return it due to my own figure flaws but it fits true to size - unfortunately I am between sizes and ordered up a size. So it was a bit baggy in the seat area so I needed to return.
customer_reviews.author: Scottmom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice looking and great fitting swimsuit. I loved it and just ordered another one a size down since I am not trying to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel 30 again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit!! It's perfect. I'm 5ft 9 and 155. I ordered a size 12. It holds the girls in place and my popbelly. I'm 48 and have been looking for coverage and support. I found it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Florida Vacation Fashion at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: For less than $30 this is quite a deal and fits great and looks good on. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice suit. Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice suit. Well made, and the bra cups are sewed in. They cover you well and hold everything in. It fit true to size. Tummy area is sung, which is what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best swimsuit for after labor moms!  I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best post partum labor tummy control swimsuit I’ve ever seen and now own. I am 5’0” petite and over 140+lbs. and I am still covering my twin stretch marks and this is the perfect bathing suit! Shipment arrival was exactly 2-days! Wonderful if you need a bathing suit right away.
customer_reviews.author: Katrna

customer_reviews.title: I super like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3, 160. 40 D. This suit holds in your stomach and lifts your breast. Very form flattering. I super like it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to be comfortable in a bathing suit and this one is a winner. It is cute and flattering and also comfortable enough to move around and play with my kids at the beach and pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering suit with tummy-control!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! I needed something flattering that also hides my postpartum belly, and this suit works for me. I am 5'9", 180lbs and I ordered size 16. I am normally a 12-14 in clothes, but I always order up in swimsuits since I have a long torso. This is a very classy-looking suit and provides plenty of coverage. I'm very happy that I chose it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Leitch

customer_reviews.title: Faded bad after 10 washings
customer_reviews.text: Fabric faded all of a sudden. I have only had the suit for 2 months, all of a sudden the fabric lost its color, looking absolutely ugly. Otherwise I liked it. I just don't think I got my money out of it before it was just too ugly to wear in public. I won't buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Fulbright

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this bathing suit in January size 8. Wore it 3 times the front tummy part is all stretched out and sags and the back the material is practically see-through down the seam. The return window has closed and I’m left with a bathing suit that I can no longer wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Pasquarella

customer_reviews.title: great suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great suit. The panels across the tummy are shear. I thought it was going to be embroidery on the top but it is printed. It is a generous fit in the top and supports well. I've used it 2 times and didn't seem to ride up when wet. I like it enough that if they came out with other patterns I would definitely purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Torn upon arrival...
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed to say that when I went to wear it during the vacation that I purchased it for, it was torn on the side. Otherwise it is a beautiful bathing suit that fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a modest flattering suit. I am 34 DD and wear a size 8 or 10 pants. The 8 was way too small. The 10 was a bit snug overall and too tight in the chest, leaving cleavage exposed (I prefer full breast coverage). The 12 fit my body and actually left a little room in the chest area, so not absolutely perfect, but definitely the best I've found after searching all season for a flattering modest suit.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS SWIMSUIT!!! I have a large bust and have always had issues finding suits that don't make me look like I'm spilling out, or give me that beautiful shapeless lump look. This suit cinches at the waist, cups your bust without the necessity of underwire, has adjustable straps, and great ruching to hide any problem areas on your belly. Buy your size, they are true to fit, even if you're an XL on the bust and smaller in the waist, but for your waist. Your bust will fit. This is great for all bust sizes, small to XXXL.
customer_reviews.author: salted_caramels_2332

customer_reviews.title: Love this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of women, I hate swimsuit shopping. It seems so difficult to find a suit that fits right and is cute. But this suit is perfect! It fits just right, it is slimming, and super cute on. I am so glad I took the chance buying this one. If you're looking for a suit that provides great coverage in some "problem areas" while still being flirty, this is it. I plan to get another in a different color I love it that much! (I bought the blue with the print on top.)
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Andrefski

customer_reviews.title: Hubby likes
customer_reviews.text: Husbands first reaction was wow that’s sexy I love it you should buy more of those LOL I like the coverage in the chest and the adjustable straps. The fabric was soft however the seams felt pokey in places I think because of the elastic. But I’m hoping when I wash it that might soften. But after further examination it was kind of tight around my legs and it almost felt too short so I ordered a bigger size. I’m six weeks postpartum with a 40 inch chest, 165 pounds and 5’7”. I originally ordered a 12 but I’m returning and getting a size 14
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit. Was apprehensive about the quality but it is great quality and v flattering fit. Ive tried miracle suit and liked the front but hated the back because it was see through- this suit is perfect and does not have that issue! As an Amazonaholic, I rely heavily on reviews from other users so I aim to contribute helpful reviews myself. Please let me know if you found my review helpful and feel free to comment if you have any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Z9z9z9

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit for Large Breasted Women
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble finding a suit that covered my breasts. This suit is a lifesaver! It covered my breasts and the design of the suit camouflaged my tummy. I also have a small waist but large booty. The design of the suite allowed for the bottom to wear as a bikini or could be pulled down and worn as a boyfriend short. I love this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Size 10 fits my 38DD Bust
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, my bra size is 38DD and hips 38" I'm 5'5" and weigh 138 lbs. I'm writing this because very few people said more than that the suit fits. As I have small hips in relationship to my bust so many times to get a size that fits the top it's too loose in the hips and leg openings. This size 10 fits me perfectly. Can't give it a 5 stair until I've worn and it in a chlorine pool, But, as for fit, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: d. richards

customer_reviews.title: Lasted barely 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in November. I liked the way it fit and looked. I swim 5/7 days a week in a chlorinated pool. It hasn't even been 2 months and the bathing suit has faded, thread bare and has become see through. Very disappointed. I had purchased this same suit in a different color in June and that one lasted 5 months before the same thing happened. I had hoped it was a fluke the first time. Apparently not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: modest, comfortable, compliments figure
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8”, 165 lbs. Bra 36 DD. This suit fit perfectly and I ordered a 14 (a size bigger than I would have ordered but I read the reviews suggesting to order up a size). It’s so comfortable and compliments me so well, I am ordering another in a different color. Covers my booty and doesn’t show cleavage. A nice modest fit. Straps are comfortable and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support and slimming
customer_reviews.text: Great bust support and fairly strong slimming panel. Tried on several suits in a mad dash before vacay and this was the clear winner. I was actually looking at options with more coverage (skirted suits, rash guards, and boy short bottoms) but this was the most flattering and supportive of them all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little tight in the bust but great fit otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Ordering clothing online is always a challenge but this worked out well for me, the suit fit well overall but was a little tight in the bust. I am pear shaped so the tummy control was a plus and the straps did not fall down before, during or after swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Stiefel

customer_reviews.title: This bathing suit fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought a bathing suit in years so I was hesitant to buy one on-line. I bought this suit in a size 10 solid black. I am 5' 8", 135 lbs and in my 60's. I was so surprised that it fits perfectly and the materials feels like it will last. I used the size chart and bought the size that fit my measurements. It is slim fitting through the waist and hips, and is long enough to fit my height. The straps are adjustable which I like and they allow for height differences. I would definitely purchase again if I ever needed a new suit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super cute and feels good on.
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit. It is well made, thoughtfully designed and super comfortable. The adjustable straps are sturdy and stay put. After buying and returning about 15 bathing suits I finally found this one and will return to this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this bathing suit. The fabric only held up for a month (only swimming 2x/wk) before showing signs of obvious wear. I machine washed on gentle cycles and hung dry. The fabric has seemed to pill and lose elasticity in the middle/lower back area; you can see its very noticeable in the pictures. When I first got the bathing suit, I was in love with it. The fit is perfect, super flattering, and seemed very well-made. Bur I never owned a bathing suit in which the fabric/ elasticity deteriorated so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Normally I buy tankini's but thought I would try a one piece. After reading reviews I took a chance and I am sure glad I did. The suit provides great support in the chest and really looks good. The rushing in the mid section helps to hide any extra pounds. This one is definitely making my beach vacation trip.
customer_reviews.author: kim merideth

customer_reviews.title: My favorite suit out of the many I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! I wear a size 16 dress and pants normally and the 16 suit fit perfectly. Supportive tummy and plenty of coverage and support for my large bust. The butt coverage is sufficient, definitely doesn’t fit like a full brief, but not too high cut to make me uncomfortable as a size 16, 40 year old, suburban mom. Ordering it in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rotella

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit for my larger chested teen for a trip to Florida with friends. She wore the suit ONCE and refuses to wear it again out of fear the suit will rip apart. The inner tag area is stretched and looks like the whole back of the suit will just rip open at any time. Waste of money! Looks nice, but not dependable material.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable swimsuit ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with my swimsuit! I have been searching for a one piece swimsuit that would offer great comfort and awesome support, but also figure flattering. This is the one! Great quality and style! For reference... 130 lbs, bra size 34D so I ordered Size 6 and Size 8 for comparison. Kept the Size 8, which is extremely comfortable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Klein

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY: Color will fade after third time in a chlorinated pool
customer_reviews.text: Initially, the look and fit of this suit was fantastic to wear as I joined my toddler in her swimming class. What is not fantastic, is the fact that the color drained out of this suit after the third time in our local YMCA pool. Conversely, my daughters' affordable suit from Target, did not fade at all. This tells me that the problem is isolated to this suit's lack of quality- not all swimsuits. Do not buy this suit unless you want a faded, trashy looking swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Derrickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit Modest Bathing Suit
customer_reviews.text: Bathing suit fits well and has support in the mid section. The straps are adjustable making it very easy to fit your shape. I chose the wine color which is a true wine color; not too red. The suit is well made and not flimsy. Considering the price point, I really wasn’t expecting much, just needed a bathing suit quickly. I was happily surprised and may order another.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t gotten it wet yet and I hear that the quality is poor after that but just trying it on I immediately loved it!! I’m buying two more in case the fabric quality diminishes when I swim in a pool I like it so much I don’t care about that. Nothing ever fits me so this is a nice surprise! I wear size 14 and I’m 5’6, around 170lbs and bought the size 14. Looks custom made!
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: It is flattering -and I felt good enough in it...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an Hawaiian trip 6 months ago and have worn maybe 6 times. Hand washed and line dry. Loved the suit until this last time when I noticed the elasticity of the suit bottoms is stretched out... it was odd. It is pretty I love the Navy/White. I would maybe buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best suit ever; most comfortable, flattering and classic!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best suit I ever bought! I’m short and overweight and wear 14 in clothes. I bought the 16, u usually need a size up in suits and it’s perfect! I’ve been spending hundreds of dollars for years on the miracle suit etc and this is so much better than those! I’ve already worn just one of 2 that I bought about 4 times in the last 3 weeks and threw it in the washer and dryer each time. Every time I put it in its like the 1st time! I just bought another and will buy more I know. BEST SUIT OUT THERE!!🤩
customer_reviews.author: Lauran Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, Good Fit, Modest Coverage Suit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Moderately cut, Good coverage of backside and front with good breast support. I love the adjustable straps! I'm 5 feet 7 and weigh 183 pounds, cup size 36DD, ordered a size 14 and it is a very good fit. The tummy support is tight but feels good once on and I'm sure the chlorine will loosen it. I'll update after swimming in the suit.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lynn

customer_reviews.title: super happy
customer_reviews.text: 100% true to size. Super comfortable, kept the ladies where they needed to be and the straps are really sturdy. A lot of suits have whimpy straps that don't help anything, or slip in the water, but i didn't ever have to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 🥰
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. The straps do loosen with wear but no big deal. I’m an H/G cup so it’s not easy finding a suit. This works with a lil stuffing but a little bigger cup would have been better. It is very cute a slimming
customer_reviews.author: shasta01

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and better than expected. I have ordered 3 suits from this brand and am happy with all of them. I ordered one size up(16, instead of 14) because my bra size is 38F and the fit was perfect, no spillage! Great support and tummy control. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not for my body type.
customer_reviews.text: cute suits but I have to return them for the fit. Quality product, well made but just too much coverage for my butt. I got one size bigger to accommodate my larger breasts but the leg holes are wide and butt coverage feels too matronly. If I get a smaller size the boobs won't fit. Maybe a better fit for beauties with bigger bottoms, hips and thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee!
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee this! Its soo hard to buy online but I dont have time to go shopping! I have alot of curves and this literally is sooo flattering. I got a size large which is my true size for most things! Loveeee it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful suit
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't purchase items without trying them on but this item was reasonably priced so I decided to go for it. So glad I did. The bathing suit fit perfectly & was flattering. Thanks for super quick ship & nice product. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed, attractive swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-designed, attractive swimsuit. It's modest and stylish, hugs curves and defines the waist. It's mesh-lined in the front with quite a bit of compression/tummy control. Size 6 fit well, a bit tight (but I'd rather tight than loose) (5'6", 125 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have spent so many hours looking for a decently modest suit to wear out with my older sons and I never thought to look here! The cut is flattering, the top is supportive with just enough of a V to look cute but not so much that everything is out there for the world to see and it has sewn in cups vs the ones that come out and end up folded and in your dryer. The tummy area is a little fitted for the support but not at all uncomfortable. Great suit for the price. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with the suit.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little tight but they always get loser after wearing for awhile. Bust has padding which I don’t need but will take out soon. It holds my tummy in which is good.
customer_reviews.author: jill d

customer_reviews.title: Suit needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that you refunded my money to a gift card and not my discover. No one told you to do that. And you returned to the gift card to my husband's account when I bought the bathing suit with my money. HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.author: 396 Medic

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and flattering
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Flattering. Easy to get on and get off. Comfortable to wear. I love the adjustable straps. Holds up well in hot tub and pool. I will order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory22202

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size ten and ordered a size ten and it is perfect! I have a feeling it will be one of those items that I wish I had bought two of, ,,for when the one gets old! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Flattering, modest, runs small
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered a large. It fit pretty snug. I returned it for a XL. I usually wear size 8-10, so I don’t generally go for XLs. Just note, it runs small. The XL is much better for me. The fabric seems to be thick and good quality. It’s super comfy to swim in. The tummy control is great, very slimming and still not to tight. The cut is flattering yet modest. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Moorhouse

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations for this suit at it is inexpensive and it’s hard to know what to expect from random amazon products sometimes. But I sized up (I wear a 12 currently but got a14) as recommended in other reviews and I LOVE the suit. I have a larger bust and was worried about support, but this suit keeps things in place and is very flattering and comfortable. I am definitely ordering another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage with support
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7”, 180 lbs, 38 DD. I’ve dreamt for years of a suit that held up my chest but didn’t have to use the halter straps around my neck to look good. This suit has wonderful coverage up top as well as on butt area. Felt very pulled together and classy in this suit!! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Henry’s

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this suit. Not true to size and does nothing for me. I am not obese but this suit put about 10lbs on me. I'll keep it to wear in our pool but certainly won't wear it in public.
customer_reviews.author: FlaDiver

customer_reviews.title: Flattering even for larger chests!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this suit! I am 5’3” and weigh 175lbs and typically wear a G cup so I was super concerned with the chest area as most suits (even larger ones) tend to never provide enough coverage in that area. This suit is great and does definitely show off my chest but in a flattering way with minimal spillage on the sides. Also love that it’s not a halter as to give my neck a break. If you’re larger chested and don’t mind revealing a bit, I highly recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Flattering bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fitting bathing suit that I've had in years. The tummy control is not too tight so it's still comfortable. Of course everyone is shaped different but this suit is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great swim suit
customer_reviews.text: It was great. Very good quality material, pretty design, not cheap looking. I only sent it back because I found another suit that was more flattering on my winnie the pooh like body frame.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bathing suit is great with the exception of the stitching in the middle. Just a couple wears and thw thread started to unravel between the beast.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Wow...Great price, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how nice this bathing suit fit! Flatting on a non-perfect body! I have paid so much more for bathing suits the past few years and they did not fit nearly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love the teal color
customer_reviews.text: My favorite suit right now and I have a million. I love the teal color and get many compliments. It’s keeps everything nice and tucked in. I’m busty, have a small belly ...
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: No support in chest area
customer_reviews.text: No support in chest area and wasnt very flattering on. I found 2 other swimsuits on amazon with chest support very reasonable price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Woods Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is so slimming and looks amazing on my 55 year old body. I am so glad I saw this as I have tried on several!!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Perona suit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suit! It fit perfectly, as described, flattering and tummy control ! Would highly recommend! I ordered a size 12
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was risky purchasing bathing suit without trying it out but it worked out great... true to size and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: This bathing suit will not hold up in chlorine.
customer_reviews.text: I used this swimming suit to swim 3 to 4 times a week in a public pool. I had two because I liked the first one so much. Both bathing suits material deteriorated and I was not able to wear them after 2 and 3 months. I am still waiting to get my refund that was agreed upon after sending pictutures of both suits.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: For the price this suit works great. Reading the reviews helped ordering for size.. i like the print on top to draw the eye up not so much around the tummy area..
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous suit great for curvy big busted women awesome really nice I bought two more in different patterns
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't buy if you have boobs
customer_reviews.text: Suit fit really nice and was flattering. On 2nd wear the top ripped open and had no boob support. Exchanged it and it happened again. Don't buy if you plan to actually swim in it unless you want the world to see the majority of your top half
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: If you are larger chested this might not be for you
customer_reviews.text: The overall suit is very nice. It held things in the way I wanted. However, I am very big chested and there was "spillage". If the top was a little larger or more side coverage it would've for fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vallory

customer_reviews.title: Excited for summer! This suit is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have been more happy with this swimsuit! Met my expectations and beyond. Perfect fit! So much so I ordered another in wine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for large chests
customer_reviews.text: Definitely for large chested girls! I'm a 36DDD/34F and I had a little extra room to spare. For reference I'm 5'8" 200lbs and bought a size 14, which is my average jeans size. I returned it because it had a little too much coverage on my chest. I didn't want those tan lines.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this bathing suit. I am going to order other colors in it. It fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PFiedl

customer_reviews.title: Cute Suit
customer_reviews.text: This swim suit fits well and is a nice color. The top seems a little bit crooked but that doesn't really take from the overall fit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bathing Suit Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a one piece that was modest without being too boring. I’m 200 lbs 5’10” and the 16 fit well. The best part is that it’s comfortable. I feel like I’m all tucked in but it’s not suffocating me. Definitely recommend, especially to the nice curvier women out there like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday swimsuit cut
customer_reviews.text: Good every day swimsuit, wish it was a little lower in the back. Great coverage in the front. Not overly tummy controlling but comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Squeaky843

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Ehh... a bit large. Old lady swimsuit. I’d drown if I was in the ocean. Heavy material. But I kept it for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Whitedove30

customer_reviews.title: Minimal chest support
customer_reviews.text: I liked this suit and fit great, except there is no breast support. I tried to give it to a friend with a smaller chest than I and she had the same problem. That’s my only compliant!
customer_reviews.author: Catelyn

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly. I recently gave birth not too long ago and it hides my stomach well. Love it! I wear size L in women’s and ordered a Large.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Tummy Control !!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE IT!!! Bathing suit gives you a nice figure and tummy control , its not to revealing in all areas, got several compliments. I am age 50 and was just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: True to size! Very flattering!
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about ordering a bathing suit on line right before we were to leave on our cruise but it fit perfectly!! Very flattering! I wish I had one in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Heather O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Pool water eats thru quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and the fit but pool water eats thru material very quickly even with rinsing out afterwards
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: great for laps
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! Has held up through many swims and launderings. Practical but with a little flare.
customer_reviews.author: 'thooo

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well. Very Slimming. Tummy area not too tight, and still slimming
customer_reviews.author: Beth Tebe

customer_reviews.title: Good suit
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how much I like this suit. It’s alway a risk to order something like this but I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering and modest suit
customer_reviews.text: Used for Swimming. Only A high cut leg would have made this a more attractive suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jo C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bathing suit. It wasn't suited for me so I didn't even wear it. But I did try on and it fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fit great but fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this bathing suit ! This is the best bathing suit I ever had/felt comfortable in - except after a month of wearing it the whole back started to become see through and looks like the chlorine are away at the swimsuit and now it is falling apart. I am very disappointed because this fit me so well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren May

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer suit!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is beautiful.Very high quality material, style and fit. Definitely compares to much more expensive suits.I love the color and it’s true to size. I’m 5’3 and 130 lbs. and the 10 was perfect and definitely controls tummy area.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy s.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit fits very nice! It is also very comfortable and made well. I am very self conscience of my tummy pouch and it is very slimming! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: A little saggy in the rear, but cute suit. I like the style and it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anoobis McAnimalpants

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, nice look
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 16. In many clothes I wear a large or XL depending on the product. This fit beautifully and does a great job decreasing the "tubby" look.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: PERONA Women's Tummy Control Swimsuit One Piece Bathing Suit Vintage Printed Swimwear
feature_bullets: 【Tummy Control】Front ruching and inner compression mesh create a slimming silhouette, hiding all flaws still contours your curves perfectly
【V-neck & Backless】One-piece swimsuit features in plunging V neckline. Ultra soft light cup, quality sponge padded
【Adjustable Straps】Wide adjustable straps make women look neat and decent without worrying falling down, who may with different height & chest size
【Retro Printed】Original retro print mixed with clouds & flowers elements makes you look elegant & unique, the classic printed will never be out of date
【Wireless Bra】Built-in bra and liner made with ultra soft & environment friendly material, make you feel comfortable without bound
